main event: Observers reported seeing a bluish flash of light in Tripoli, Libya over two nights in August 1958.
interesting points: The flash was described as blue to bluish-red and about 2 ft across., The observation lasted for 2 seconds., It was noted that the object was moving south., Multiple observers sighted the flash from adjacent balconies., There was much local jet traffic and no accompanying noise before, during, or after the sighting.
sighted object: a blue to bluish-red flash of light
witness description: observers on adjacent balconies of second-story apartments
